banner.intro1: Hello! I am a systems engineer and web developer. As a systems engineer, I am responsible for building and maintaining complex computer systems, ranging from computer networks to critical software applications. I often work on large-scale systems that require high stability and security.
banner.intro2: As a web developer, I specialize in creating high-quality websites and web applications. I have in-depth knowledge of web programming languages such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and I am proficient in popular frameworks like ReactJs and Vite. I am also well-versed in backend technologies such as databases and Node.js.
banner.intro3: With skills and knowledge in these two fields, I can participate in complex projects from building system infrastructure to developing interactive user interfaces.
banner.name: My name is Zui.

skill.intro: As a developer, I have skills in programming, problem-solving, and collaboration, and I am proficient in languages such as Java and JavaScript. I have experience in web development.

project.intro: This is a chat project that enables real-time communication, enhancing connectivity and collaboration. It provides a seamless messaging experience with robust security features using the latest technologies.
